name: One Button (Spaceshark)
description:
One Button

One Button is a fast-paced and casual arcade game with only One Button. You have to click the One Button as fast as possible in a variable time limit, but the One Button bounces and dodges around the screen. Accuracy is key. Missed clicks lose you points while successful ones gain you points. 

This game was made as a personal challenge to discover how far polish and graphics can make a simple game go. This is my game also released on mobile (android) so it's not very ambitious. Hope you guys enjoy! Made with Unity.

Google Play Store Link:

Mobile App

------------------ (RECOMMENDED DOWNLOAD: V4) VERSIONS: V1 (Mac/Windows): base game with 0 polish V2 (Mac/Windows): graphics overhaul update V3 (Mac/Windows): audio overhaul update V4 (Mac/Windows/Linux/Android): gameplay enhancement and final polish update ------------------ Download Instructions:

Android/Google Play: go to google play store listing linked above and install

Mac: unzip downloaded .zip file and run .app application file by double clicking on it. You may have to right click the file and click open if MacOS doesn't allow you to run it at first.

Windows: unzip downloaded .zip file and keep contents of folder together at all times. double click on the .exe file.

Linux: I don't really have much information about this OS, you'll have to figure it out.
